experience_assessment: I have read many papers in this area.
review_assessment:_thoroughness_in_paper: I made a quick assessment of this paper.

title: Official Blind Review #2
review_assessment:_checking_correctness_: I did not assess the derivations or theory.
review: The topic of this paper is out of the reviewer's domain (Bayesian optimization, RL, and neuroscience). The reviewer has been reviewing ICLR for several years. Such mismatches had not happened in the past.
